sources.name: UN projected population by age group
sources.description:
Variable description Total population (both sexes combined) by five-year age group, region, subregion and country
Data published by UN Population Statistics Division
Link https://esa.un.org/unpd/wpp/
Retrieved 2017-06-27

Population trends for the under 15 age group have been calculated as the sum of all age groups up to 14 years old. Over 15 constitutes all individuals aged 15 or above. The total constitutes the sum of both age categories.
